title: What Botox is and how it works
summary: Botox is a neuromodulator that relaxes targeted muscles to soften expression lines.
body: It temporarily reduces muscle activity where it is placed, which can soften lines caused by repeated expressions. Results are subtle and vary by person.

title: Common Botox myths
summary: The biggest myths are about looking frozen, safety, and instant results.
body: Most results are subtle when done conservatively. Outcomes depend on dosage, placement, and your anatomy, which is why consults matter.

title: Red flags in med spas
summary: High-pressure sales, vague credentials, and rushed consults are warning signs.
body: A safe provider explains options clearly, sets expectations, and welcomes questions. If you feel rushed or pushed, pause.
